Name: Nosos
About the game: Nosos Is a multiplayer horror game. The game take place in a house with four players and one monster (AI). Players are named “exorcists“, they have a list of items to find in the house and to burn at the place of the ritual in order to beat the monster. But among the four players there is a renegade whose aim is to prevent the ritual process and kill all exorcists. The renegade has habilities to partially control the monster and to slow down exorcists. But if exorcists find out who the renegade is, they can get rid of him by tying him up and burning him in the place of the ritual. Nosos was created to be played with 4 players, however the game is playable with less than 4 players. But for 2 players or less, some functionalities of the game have been removed. Immersive Experience: With realistic graphics. Co-op: You can play with 4 friends of you in the game.
